item.title: Travis Kelce joins activist investor Jana Partners in push to revive Six Flags
item.description: Jana has partnered with Kelce, Glenn Murphy and Dave Habiger in a group that now holds a roughly 9% stake in the amusement park operator.

item.title: Beyond Meat soars 146% after addition to meme ETF, Walmart deal
item.description: Plant-based alternative meat company Beyond Meat will expanded distribution across the United States through an agreement with Walmart.

item.title: This ETF strategy could help risk-averse investors ride out wild market swings
item.description: Invesco senior portfolio manager John Burrello sees income funds that employ options-based strategies as a suitable approach.

item.title: Investor Lauren Taylor Wolfe says we are 'absolutely' in an AI bubble now
item.description: Lauren Taylor Wolfe, co-founder of Impactive Capital, said the surge in enthusiasm around artificial intelligence has all the markings of a bubble.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Warner Bros. Discovery, Beyond Meat, General Motors & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.
